name: Feed Me plz
description:
We made this for the occupational therapy jam at our university. It's about feeding your cats while coping with dementia and the memory loss that comes with it.

It was made by Andreas Cealera (design and programming), Spuk (design and art) and Orla Ni Haodha (occupational therapy consultant).

Important!! This game also appears on Andreas' page "Andreas Express", so it's nothing fishy if you see it twice.
